answers.answer: good luck I had dd at 37w due to GD...

question: Had my 36 week appt today and the doctor said let's talk about your delivery.....then said he wanted to deliver between 38-39 weeks because of my gestational diabetes.  So he is saying June 2nd!!  Holy cow....that is only 19 more days.  I'm a little in shock - this is all getting so real now!!!!!!!  I still feel like I have so much to do before she arrives....but I can't wait for her to get here too!  I think this smile is going to last a long time :)
title: 36 week appt - 19 days left!!
